orientation

Class DefaultOrienteer

  • java.lang.Object
    • orientation.DefaultOrienteer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Orienteer

    public class DefaultOrienteer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Orienteer
    Author:
    Michael Golfi #260552298, Paul Albert-Lebrun #260507074 Provides abstraction layer for orientation algorithm. Carl Patenaude Poulin was consulted for suggestions of a valid approach to this problem.
